post:
**[Host Nun](http://hostnun.net/congregation.html)** has been providing shared hosting services since July of 2013. Alongside our popular [**$8.88 / year plan**](http://hostnun.net/shared.html), here's a quick subdomain offer for LET. Perfect for those who are curious about the quality of our service/support, but don't want to commit to a larger plan off the bat. Test the waters for only $3 and a free subdomain!

[![](http://img.bs/i/930b253d668af30fe1792b7cf17fec4e.png)](https://abbey.hostnun.net/cart.php?a=add&pid=92)

**What's included?**  
• _subdomain_.deusexmachina.zone  
• cPanel  
• 300MB disk space  
• 3GB bandwidth  
• 1 FTP account  
• 1 email account  
• 1 MySQL database  

**Where is it hosted?**  
Quadranet in Dallas [via **[MSP](http://lowendtalk.com/discussion/38451/myserverplanet-com-8-50-year-massive-space-massive-savings-for-you)**]

**Money back guarantee?**  
40 days and 40 nights. Give our service a shot at no risk to your wallet.

**E.g.**  
**http://spandex.deusexmachina.zone**

**Thanks for your interest and God bless!**
